validation_mobile_number_error: Please enter a valid 10 digit number.
revoke_user_title: Uh-Oh! Your Phone number is not registered with us.
validation_otp_error: Incorrect OTP. Please enter correct OTP.
enable_location_title: Please enable the location services for Accurate attendance capture and task management.
track_location_title: It allows Hoppr to verify your work location when you punch-in and perform tasks.
grant_location_message:
1. Open “Settings”
2. Click on “Location”
3. Select “Local Delight”
4. Click on “Permissions”
5. Click on “Location”
6. Select “Allow only while using the app”
grant_location_message_ios:
1. Open “Settings”
2. Tap on “Hoppr”
3. Select “Location”
4. Choose “While Using the App”

Your privacy matters:
• Data is used solely for work verification
• Your location is not continuously tracked
user_inactive_title: Sorry! Your account is no longer active.
incorrect_password: Sorry! Your password is not valid.
already_logged_in: Already have an account? Log in
already_have_account: Already have a account? Click here to Login
disclaimer_message: We will be in touch with you and will deliver you soon. Payment accepted will be via UPI or cash
address_message: Write now we are accepting order in Neharpar Faridabad area. Will be soon in your area soon.
tag_line: Say yes to Organic and healthy food
